channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- User Activity Log
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- User Activity Log

item.title: CVE-2023-2761|2024-08-02T06:33:05.512Z -- unknown -- user%20activity%20log
item.description: The User Activity Log WordPress plugin before 1.6.3 does not properly sanitise and escape the `txtsearch` parameter before using it in a SQL statement in some admin pages, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by high privilege users such as admin.

item.title: CVE-2023-3435|2024-08-02T06:55:03.386Z -- unknown -- user%20activity%20log
item.description: The User Activity Log WordPress plugin before 1.6.5 does not correctly sanitise and escape several parameters before using it in a SQL statement as part of its exportation feature, allowing unauthenticated attackers to conduct SQL injection attacks.
